ev

### Creating a ggplot

```{r}
ggplot(data = ev %>% filter(AccelSec < 15)) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = AccelSec, y = Range_Km))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ev %>% filter(FastCharge_KmH > 0)) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = FastCharge_KmH, y = Range_Km))
```
